text: Igor Vladimirovich Lukashin (; born 7 August 1979 in Penza) is Russian diver who, along with Dmitri Sautin, won the gold medal at the 2000 Summer Olympics in the men's 10 m platform synchronized event. ==References== * Category:1979 births Category:Living people Category:Russian male divers Category:Olympic divers of Russia Category:Divers at the 2000 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic gold medalists for Russia Category:Sportspeople from Penza Category:Olympic medalists in diving Category:Medalists at the 2000 Summer Olympics Category:World Aquatics Championships medalists
title: Igor Lukashin
